original_text: and over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite; and over the produce of the vineyards for the wine cellars was Zabdi the Shiphmite.
korean_text: 라마 사람 시므이는 포도원을 맡았고 스밤 사람 삽디는 포도원의 소산 포도주 곳간을 맡았고

sentences.original_text: and over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite
sentences.korean_translation: 포도원을 관리한 사람은 라맛 사람 시므이였으며

sentences.original_text: and over the produce of the vineyards for the wine cellars
sentences.korean_translation: 포도주 창고에 쓸 포도원의 소산을 관리한 사람은
